title: Testing intelligence with the Stanford-Binet
brief_description: Records the actions of four children to selected items from the Stanford-Binet intelligence test. Explains the meaning of mental age and the calculation of the intelligence quotient.
description: Records the actions of four children to selected items from the Stanford-Binet intelligence test. Explains the meaning of mental age and the calculation of the intelligence quotient.
